mapper.select: SELECT id, activation_code, birthday, cellphone, create_by, create_time, edu_quali, email, find_pwd_code, find_pwd_last_date, last_login_time, login_name, name, salt, sex, sha_password, status, version FROM t_user WHERE email=#{email}
